articles.author: Aya Wagatsuma, Margaryta Kirakosian
articles.title: Asian Stocks Rise Tracking US Gains; Oil Declines: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg
articles.description: European stocks edged higher after another record high on Wall Street as traders looked forward to the day’s major US bank earnings. Oil dropped as concerns eased about Israel attacking Iranian energy facilities.
